content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Coal Mining Setup at (-14.0, -15.0)
- Burner mining drill at (24.0, -15.0)
- Wooden chest at (23.5, -16.5) containing 38 coal

###Iron Ore Mining Setup at (-14.0, 23.0)
- Burner mining drill at (-14.0, 23.0)
- Wooden chest at (-14.5, 21.5) containing 116 iron ore

###Iron Smelting Setup at (-10.0, 20.0)
- Two stone furnaces at (-11.0, 20.0) and (-9.0, 20.0)
- Both furnaces have 23 coal as fuel but no ingredients

###Copper Production Setup at (22.0, 20.0)
- Burner mining drill at (20.0, 20.0) for copper ore
- Stone furnace at (24.0, 20.0) containing 23 copper plates and 19 coal
- Wooden chest at (20.5, 21.5) for ore collection
- Burner inserter at (21.5, 21.5) moving items from chest to transport belt
- Complex belt system consisting of:
  * Input belt group from (23.5, 18.5) to (21.5, 18.5)
  * Output belt group from (21.5, 21.5) to (23.5, 21.5)
- Additional wooden chest at (24.5, 17.5)

ERROR TIPS

###Errors when placing inserters near transport belts
- Before placing inserters, check if there are transport belts in the target position
- Increase spacing parameter when placing entities next to transport belts
- Consider removing conflicting transport belts before placing new inserters
- Verify the direction and position of existing entities before attempting to place new ones

###Entity Status Issues
- Multiple burner mining drills are out of fuel - ensure regular fuel supply
- Furnaces lack ingredients - establish proper input logistics
- Inserters waiting for source items - verify input supply chain is working correctly
